title: Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth       Kids, you can enjoy the dunes in many ways whether you are at home, in school, or at the park. At the Park  Hike one of the many trails Visit Chellberg Farm and the Bailly Homestead Enjoy a picnic with friends and family Come out for a program with family, friends, school, and organized group Visit the beach Become a Junior Ranger Explore ParKids - A Program for Teens  At Home or School  Explore this website Watch one of our videos Learn about the different plants from the plant slide showTake the Web Ranger Challenge Complete the Water Safety Challenge Complete the Web Ranger Challenge  Things to know before you come to the park  Learn about water safety by taking the Water Safety Challenge Check out the directions section for maps and parking area hours Read our pets page before bringing your pet to the park Discover what poison ivy looks like Leave your snow/sand/boggy boards at home since the park has a no sledding rule.
